title: Weird gamebreaking connection issues
body:
I will name issues that started happening 3-4 days ago and wont go away.

multiple times in games


my champion moves in a straight line or stays put and does not move. does not do what I click. despite me not dcing. and being able to see the live game

also

I've been dcing often and I have to reconnect everytime. I am able to connect 100% of the time and the issue is not with my internet. the game however won't connect unless I exit and reconnect and the "please wait" thing does not connect it keeps going infinitely. why does this happen in the first place anyway My internet seems fine

replies.body:
While your connection may be fine to some sites and services, each site or game you access online resides in a different geolocation, meaning your network routing to each server looks different. This means that you could have issues accessing or staying connected to League while having no issues accessing Google or YouTube. These issues are usually caused by certain local network settings that don't play well with League, so I strongly recommend going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure this isn't the case.

Let me know if those steps ended up resolving your issues.
